text.text: The Castle East high-grade silver project is located in the Gowganda camp. In the 1900s, the Castle, Capitol and Oâ€™Brien mines were the most prolific in the area, accounting for about three-quarters of the total 80 million ounces silver mined.
The Robinson Zone discovery is unique in the district as it's a grassroots find of a potential deposit aided by geophysics and a custom built downhole camera.
